text: Cuxton railway station is a railway station in Cuxton in Kent. The station is on the Medway Valley Line. ==Services== Train services at Cuxton are run by Southeastern, They use EMUs. The off-peak service is: * 2 trains per hour to * 2 trains per hour to via Some trains run to . On Sundays, the train services are hourly. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Medway Category:1856 establishments in Europe Category:1850s establishments in England
title: Cuxton railway station
